title: These Are Opposites
subtle: Concept (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Big or small? Short or tall? Children use these words to describe differences in things they see every day. These Are Opposites introduces students to some common words that describe things that are opposites. Detailed and entertaining illustrations highlight the meanings of the opposite words discussed in the book. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and to identify and use periods.
meta: dry, flat, hot, round, small, wet
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word they
